PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by enacting section 4801.1 which prescribes the conditions a foreign mutual fund trust must meet in order to be considered an "exempt trust".

precis:
Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by enacting section 4801.1
which prescribes the conditions a foreign mutual fund trust must meet in
order to be considered an "exempt trust".
